info.name: CNN - No ads.  Better banner.
info.description: Reduced the banner bar, changed the harsh red banner to a subdued blue one, removed advertisement sections. Works well with Adblock turned off.
info.additionalInfo:
The red banner had to go.  Same with the advertisement blocks.

I attempted to document the changes - but as with most documentation, it can't always be trusted.

Edited
  02-24-2011 - added additional styles for blogs pages.
  03-07-2011 - added background image in banner.
  03-09-2011 - moved background image to data uri
  06-22-2011 - remove right/left side ads
  06-23-2011 - fixed banner on eatocracy pages
  07-02-2011 - removed slide down story bar
  08-01-2011 - improved advertisement removal.
  09-14-2011 - additional ad removal
  10-04-2011 - added blue banner image to the 'beta' (read lame) video page.
  11-10-2011 - removed ad in the "from our shows" group.
  11-28-2011 - made some headway on iReport section
  01-25-2012 - additional ad removal
  11-04-2014 - changed background color on .cnn-hdr tag
